content.rendered:
Raised by two doctors, Hill knows the importance of quality, accessible healthcare. Our current healthcare system leaves millions uninsured or burdened by sky-high medical costs. One-third of all money raised on GoFundMe is for medical bills! That’s got to change – because no one should go bankrupt for the crime of seeking care.

Coverage for All

Every Michigander deserves access to affordable and comprehensive healthcare. That’s why Hill is fighting for a single-payer system that provides universal coverage to all residents, regardless of income, employment status, or pre-existing conditions. Because in the wealthiest country in the history of the world, healthcare should be a right, not a privilege.

Comprehensive Benefits

Hill knows that dignified care can be the difference between life and death. A universal healthcare plan will cover a comprehensive range of medical services, including preventive care, mental health services, dental and vision care, prescription drugs, and reproductive health services – because Michiganders and all Americans deserve holistic, all-encompassing care.

Protecting Women’s Reproductive Rights

Hill has always fought for a woman’s right to choose — and he plans on taking that fight straight to Washington. Now more than ever, we must protect and expand women’s reproductive rights. A universal healthcare plan ensures access to comprehensive reproductive healthcare, including contraception, family planning services, and safe, legal, accessible abortion.

Lower Prescription Drug Costs

Big Pharma greed is tearing Michigan families apart. In fact, we’re paying 14 times as much as our neighbors to the north for a vial of insulin. That’s why Hill will fight for serious prescription drug reform, including allowing the government to negotiate drug prices with pharmaceutical companies, promoting the use of generic medications, and cracking down on price-gouging practices.
